question: When is World Brain Tumor Day observed across the world, every year?
explanation:
World Brain Tumour Day is observed on 8 June every year, across the world. The objective of the day is to raise awareness and educate general public about brain tumour.
The World Brain Tumour Day was initially designated by Leipzig-based non-profit organisation 
German Brain Tumour Association in the year 2000. Later it was acknowledged across the world. The observance also highlights the need of more research in the field.
